channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: In the Salon with Gatineau
channel.desc: Professional beauty products from the pioneering skincare specialists. Gatineau combines the highest quality plant and marine extracts with the very latest cutting-edge biotechnology.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Health & Wellbeing
channel.desc: Look after yourself with our showcase of exercise equipment, supplements, meal plans and other tools to help you maintain a healthy lifestyle.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Loves...
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see our exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to love.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: ORLY Nails
channel.desc: Innovators in natural nailcare, Orly offers contemporary nail colours with on point finishes and textures, creating on-trend shades for salon professionals and many enthusiasts alike.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Tools & Accessories
channel.desc: The beauty tools you use are as important as your products, so enjoy professional-standard implements and accessories, from lash curlers to make-up bags and tweezers to brushes.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Doll10 Beauty
channel.desc: Get high performance results you want with Doll10: the pioneer in age reversal beauty and a combination of breakthrough technologies, age transforming complexes and real life make-up techniques.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Loves Tili
channel.desc: Discover some fabulous beauty finds in this show with Tili, offering you everything from gorgeous skincare essentials to cult make-up favourites. Go on, treat yourself or someone you love.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Steals and Deals
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see the latest deals and bag a beauty bargain. We've got an exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to adore.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Elizabeth Grant
channel.desc: Step into the world of Elizabeth Grant, a beloved British beauty brand that offers superior skincare, working to give you complexion confidence at any age. Give your skin the gift of gorgeousness.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Loves with Dyson Haircare
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see our exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to love, featuring Dyson's high-tech Supersonic Hairdryer.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Elemis Skin Therapies
channel.desc: Care for your mind and body holistically and sensuously with therapeutic aromatherapy. Elemis are famed for their premier spa and salon treatments, and for the absolute purity of their plant oils.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: L'Occitane Everyday Moments of Joy
channel.desc: Create moments of everyday joy with a little help from L'Occitane beauty. From beautiful bodycare to sumptuous skin formulas, immerse your senses in this revered beauty brand with us.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: L'Occitane Everyday Moments of Joy
channel.desc: Create moments of everyday joy with a little help from L'Occitane beauty. From beautiful bodycare to sumptuous skin formulas, immerse your senses in this revered beauty brand with us.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Day Deals
channel.desc: Discover a host of top offers from some big names in our Beauty Day event.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Steals and Deals
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see the latest deals and bag a beauty bargain. We've got an exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to adore.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Feel Good & Glow Beauty
channel.desc: Feel Good & Glow Beauty.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Loves Tili
channel.desc: Discover some fabulous beauty finds in this show with Tili, offering you everything from gorgeous skincare essentials to cult make-up favourites. Go on, treat yourself or someone you love.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Hair by Philip Kingsley
channel.desc: Internationally renowned Philip Kingsley and his team give expert tips and tricks on how to get the best results for your hair and scalp.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Margaret Dabbs London
channel.desc: Pamper your hands and feet with innovative hand and footcare formulas from international podiatrist and foot expert Margaret Dabbs.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: In the Salon with Gatineau
channel.desc: Professional beauty products from the pioneering skincare specialists. Gatineau combines the highest quality plant and marine extracts with the very latest cutting-edge biotechnology.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Steals and Deals
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see the latest deals and bag a beauty bargain. We've got an exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to adore.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Australian Bodycare
channel.desc: This Australian Bodycare range is inspired by the ancient traditions of the Aborigines who discovered the effects of natural ingredients. Find cleansing and caring products for your skin.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Ultrasun Professional Suncare
channel.desc: Ultrasun have the answer to your summer holidays with once-a-day suncare protection. Tune in to find out which product is best for you and your family all year round.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Liz Earle Naturally Active
channel.desc: Liz Earle is an award-winning British beauty brand renowned for creating naturally active skincare and bodycare products, which help to deliver real results for all ages and skin types.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Day Deals
channel.desc: Discover a host of top offers from some big names in our Beauty Day event.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Health & Wellbeing
channel.desc: Look after yourself with our showcase of exercise equipment, supplements, meal plans and other tools to help you maintain a healthy lifestyle.
